segment.text: As you may have already been told, my % has gone missing.
Do you have any leads as to where # may have gone?
...I've run out of options at this point.
I need you to find my %.
I understand that you are newly recruited, but with all of the attacks recently, you are all that I have.
I need you to head through the plains to the village DriftWood and investigate everyone you meet along the way.
Please exercise caution when talking with anyone. I do not want this information about the @'s disappearance to fall into the wrong hands.
With the current climate, there are bound to be individuals that want to misguide or even harm you.
For your travels, I will entrust you with one of my finest weapons. Which would you prefer?
Ah. The sword. An excellent choice for a knight. Here is some gold as well. Be safe on your journey.
Ah. The axe. A bit nontraditional, but I respect that. Here is some gold as well. Be safe on your journey.
Ah. The spear. Tried and true. Here is some gold as well. Be safe on your journey.
Oh! Great news! Where have you seen $?
